Name: Cutter
XpTrigger: you address a challenge with violence or coercion

Abilities.Name: Battleborn
Abilities.Text: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.

Abilities.Name: Bodyguard
Abilities.Text: When you protect a teammate, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.

Abilities.Name: Ghost Fighter
Abilities.Text: You may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain potency in combat vs. the supernatural. You may grapple with spirits to restrain and capture them.

Abilities.Name: Leader
Abilities.Text: When you command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they're not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.

Abilities.Name: Mule
Abilities.Text: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.

Abilities.Name: Not To Be Trifled With
Abilities.Text: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman - engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.

Abilities.Name: Savage
Abilities.Text: When you unleash physical violence, it's especially frightening. When you command a frightened target, take +1d.

Abilities.Name: Vigorous
Abilities.Text: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.

Abilities.Name: Veteran
Abilities.Text: Choose a special ability from another source.

Items.Name: Fine hand weapon
Items.Desscription: A finely crafted one-handed melee weapon of your choice.

Items.Name: Fine heavy weapon
Items.Desscription: A finely crafted two-handed melee weapon of your choice.

Items.Name: Scary weapon or tool
Items.Desscription: A scary-looking hand weapon or tool.

Items.Name: Manacles & chain
Items.Desscription: A set of heavy manacles and chain, suitable for restraining a prisoner.

Items.Name: Rage essence vial
Items.Desscription: A single dose, which greatly enhances the user's strength, resistance to pain, and irrational aggression for the span of several minutes.
